system.description:
When you demand answers from someone weaker than you, roll +Iron.

On a 7+, ask two questions from the list. They must answer honestly. On a 6-, you may only ask one question.

On a 9-, one of their answers may be a lie, if they want to lie to you. You will not be told which answer is the lie, or even if there is a lie at all.

  • What can you tell me about ________?
  • What are you hiding?
  • Where is ________?
  • No more questions. Deal damage and end the interrogation.

This Move cannot be Shared.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You may only ask one question.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value: Ask two questions from the list. They must answer honestly.

success.label: Success!
success.value: Ask two questions from the list. They must answer honestly.
